name: Flying Axe
description:
Play with an axe to chop down trees. Earn coins and unlock new hidden axes. Don't forget to sharpen your axe or it will break.

• Chop trees with an axe. Try not to miss any or pay 10 coins to continue game
• Collect coins and unlock new axes. Each axe has personal stats
• Hold on for 120 seconds and all collected coins will be saved
• Sharpen your axe with a finger or with B/X buttons. Otherwise it will lose its efficiency and break in the end
• The game speed will be increasing during gameplay by music
